summary: The story of the generation who lived through the entire Soviet period is told through the main character: his childhood spent in a village, true friendship, work in Soviet Klaipeda, thrilling eroticism, and a final, fatal love.
cast: Giedrius Kiela|Egle Mikulionyte|Oksana Borbat|Yevgeniya Varenitsa|Diana Aneviciute|Jurate Onaityte|Mindaugas Ancevicius|Daumantas Ciunis|Sarunas Datenis|Darius Gumauskas|Vladimiras Jefremovas|Valentinas Masalskis|Darius Meskauskas|Neringa Nekrasiute|Valentin Novopolskij|Toma Vaskeviciute|Jurate Vilunaite
title: Duburys
